SETTINGS.AutoRollAttacksHint: When an item is activated from a character sheet or macro, automatically roll the attack roll for the item if it exists.
SETTINGS.AutoRollDamageHint: When an item is activated from a character sheet or macro, automatically roll the first damage group for the item if one exists.
SETTINGS.GlobalHint: This setting sets the default setting for all players.
SETTINGS.LocalHint: This setting overrides the world default for this client only.
SETTINGS.ModifierAdvHint: When holding this modifier key, MRE will roll with advantage.
SETTINGS.ModifierDisAdvHint: When holding this modifier key, MRE will roll with disadvantage.
SETTINGS.ModifierShowRollDialogHint: When holding this modifier key, MRE will show the roll dialog, rather than skipping it.
